4. Yvonne Gallardo-Van Ornam

Yvonne Gallardo-Van Ornam
=========================

![Yvonne Gallardo-Van Ornam](https://arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10276 "Yvonne Gallardo-Van Ornam")

Yvonne Gallardo, Position 6
---------------------------

Email [Yvonne Gallardo-Van Ornam](mailto:ygallardo@arlingtonwa.gov)

Term Information
----------------

Appointed to unexpired term June 27, 2022. Term expired December 31, 2023.  
Elected Term January 1, 2024 through December 31, 2027.

Occupation
----------

Yvonne works in grants and public-sector contracting, supporting community-focused projects and organizations. Her professional experience includes economic development, nonprofit leadership, and local government, with an emphasis on connecting funding, policy, and community needs to strengthen local services, support small businesses, and enhance quality of life for Arlington residents, informed by a service-oriented perspective shaped by her background in public service and the U.S. Navy.

Education
---------

Yvonne holds a Bachelor of Science degree and a Master of Business Administration. She is also a graduate of Leadership Snohomish County, a regional leadership development program focused on civic engagement, public policy, and community collaboration.

Family
------

Yvonne and her husband met during their service in the U.S. Navy at Naval Station Everett in 2003 and settled in Arlington in 2006. They have raised their two children here and appreciate the strong sense of community, outdoor spaces, and quality of life Arlington offers, sharing their home with two dogs and the occasional wild rabbits that call their front yard home.

Hobbies
-------

Baking is Yvonne’s love language, and she enjoys baking for family and friends. Her favorite day of the week is “Sample Sunday,” when she experiments with new recipes for her family’s mobile food booth business and shares the results with neighbors and friends.

Current Affiliations/Associations
---------------------------------

+ Connections with Purpose
+ Snohomish County Housing and Community Development Policy Advisory Board
+ Snohomish County Parks Advisory Board
+ Rotary Club of Arlington
+ Arlington Street Fair Committee
+ Certificate of Municipal Leadership - Association of Washington Cities
